thread.title: Markets Give China’s Currency Policy Vote of Confidence
thread.title_full: Markets Give China’s Currency Policy Vote of Confidence - WSJ

author: Anjani Trivedi
title: Markets Give China’s Currency Policy Vote of Confidence
text:
As Beijing softens its heavy-handed approach to its currency, markets appear to be gaining confidence in its shifting stance.
Beijing has spent less to defend the value of the yuan in recent weeks, while making strides in allowing it to flow more freely across its borders. That has helped ease a long-standing tussle between the central bank and investors about the value of the yuan, also known as the renminbi.
